alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:06AM EST until January 11 at 4:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a Flood Warning for the following creeks in Pennsylvania... Conodoguinet Creek near Hogestown affecting Cumberland County. For the Conodoguinet Creek...including Hogestown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Conodoguinet Creek near Hogestown. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Low lying areas in the vicinity of Erbs Bridge Road, Prowell Road, Stone Spring Lane, and Oyster Mill Road are flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The creek is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 8.4 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued later this morning.
